opponent.label: Misaka Mikoto
opponent.description:
Known as the Ace of Tokiwadai, or The Railgun, Misaka Mikoto is the 3rd most powerful of the espers of Academy City. One of only 7 people ranked at Level 5, she has the power to take on whole armies at once. She has very fine control over electromagnetism, which allows her to manipulate anything magnetic, hack into any computer system, and fire metallic objects at several times the speed of sound.
She is friendly, a collector of Gekota merchandise and enjoys making new friends. Has a natural distrust of Scientists.
